response.overview: Encouraged by her best friend Carla, she begins to explore new emotional connections with other young people. However, as she struggles to navigate this new phase of her life, recurring supernatural visions of Indigenous rituals begin to haunt her thoughts, leading her toward a profound awakening and a deeper understanding of her own identity.
response.tagline: Sara, a 12-year-old girl from the Amazon, assists her grandmother Ivete, a traditional healer, in her work.
response.title: Nhandê
